NK041(di)043:1: // byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam phan bde'i ljon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK041(di)043:2: byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam phan bde'i ljon pa zhes bya ba /
NK041(di)043:3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)043:4: don gnyis lhun grub ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK041(di)043:5: bden gnyis ngo bo bstan pa dam pa'i chos //
NK041(di)043:6: rig grol gnyis ldan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la //
NK041(di)043:7: tshogs gnyis dpal gyi gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)043:8: rab 'byams zhing gi lha mi'i longs spyod dang //
NK041(di)043:9: rab dwangs yid kyis rnam sprul mchod sprin 'di //
NK041(di)043:10: rab mchog rgyal ba sras dang bcas la 'bul //
NK041(di)043:11: rab tu brtse ba'i thugs kyis bzhes su gsol //
NK041(di)043:12: bdag gis thog med dus ring 'khor ba na //
NK041(di)043:13: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pas //
NK041(di)043:14: bdag med chos la mtshan mar bzung ba'i sdig /
NK041(di)043:15: bdag nyid gnong zhing 'gyod pas so sor bshags //
NK041(di)043:16: sras bcas rgyal ba'i tshogs gnyis zab mo dang //
NK041(di)043:17: slob dang mi slob nyan thos rang rgyal dang //
NK041(di)043:18: so skyes dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba la //
NK041(di)043:19: dga' zhing spro ba'i sems kyis yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)043:20: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs rgyal ba yis //
NK041(di)043:21: 'gro ba'i khams dang dbang po ji bzhin du //
NK041(di)043:22: zab dang rgya che theg mchog dam pa'i chos //
NK041(di)043:23: rgyun du bskor bar yang yang gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)043:24: gang dang mnyam med 'dren pa chos kyi rje //
NK041(di)043:25: mdzad pa mthar phyin mya ngan 'da' bzhed rnams //
NK041(di)043:26: 'khor ba ji srid bar du gzhan don la //
NK041(di)043:27: mya ngan mi 'da' yun du bzhugs par gsol //
NK041(di)043:28: 'dir 'bad dge ba mtshon nas dus gsum gyi //
NK041(di)043:29: dge tshogs mtha' dag gcig tu bsdoms pa'i mthus //
NK041(di)043:30: mkha' khyab 'gro ba'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu //
NK041(di)043:31: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog /
NK041(di)043:32: de ma thob pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du //
NK041(di)043:33: dal 'byor lus ldan bshes gnyen mchog bsten nas //
NK041(di)043:34: thos bsam sgom la rtag par brtson pa yis //
NK041(di)043:35: rgyal ba'i bstan la bya ba byed par shog /
NK041(di)043:36: dal 'byor rnyed kyang r+ts+wa kha'i zil thig ltar //
NK041(di)043:37: ring du mi gnas 'gyur ba'i tshul rig nas //
NK041(di)043:38: tshe 'di bsgrub pa'i bsam sbyor rgyang bsrings te //
NK041(di)043:39: mi rtag 'chi ba rjes su dran par shog /
NK041(di)043:40: tshe 'phos nas kyang thog med 'khor ba nas //
NK041(di)043:41: bsag pa'i las kyi sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //
NK041(di)043:42: las 'bras bslu ba med par yid ches nas //
NK041(di)043:43: dge sdig las la 'jug ldog byed par shog /
NK041(di)043:44: gang du skyes kyang bde ba'i skabs med cing //
NK041(di)043:45: gang la bsams kyang 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can //
NK041(di)043:46: gang zhig bsgrubs kyang snying po med pa'i chos //
NK041(di)043:47: gang yin shes nas yid ni 'byung bar shog /
NK041(di)043:48: byang chub bsgrub la bar du gcod pa'i rkyen //
NK041(di)043:49: mi mthun bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gro zhing //
NK041(di)043:50: gnas dang yo byad grogs sogs mthun pa'i rkyen //
NK041(di)043:51: bsam pa bzhin du lhun gyis grub par shog /
NK041(di)043:52: rang gzhan 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag nas //
NK041(di)043:53: bslu med skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum po la //
NK041(di)043:54: dad dang gus pa'i bsam pa rtse gcig gis //
NK041(di)043:55: skyabs su 'gro ba'i sdom pa nod par shog /
NK041(di)043:56: thog med dus nas drin chen pha ma rnams //
NK041(di)043:57: rigs drug gnas su sdug bsngal myong rnams la //
NK041(di)043:58: bzod brlag med pa'i snying rje dang bcas pa'i //
NK041(di)043:59: rlabs chen byang chub sems mchog bskyed par shog /
NK041(di)043:60: gzhan gyi don du sangs rgyas bsgrubs pa'i blos //
NK041(di)043:61: 'gro la phan phyir lhag bsam go gyon te //
NK041(di)043:62: phar phyin drug la tshul bzhin bslabs pa yis //
NK041(di)043:63: rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyod la 'jug par shog /
NK041(di)043:64: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang //
NK041(di)043:65: bsam pa bzang po tshad med bzhin ldan zhing //
NK041(di)043:66: sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don mthun pa'i //
NK041(di)043:67: sbyor ba bsdu dngos bzhi la brtson par shog /
NK041(di)043:68: gang la ci 'dod zang zing sbyi na pa dang //
NK041(di)043:69: chos don gnyer la legs par bshad pa dang //
NK041(di)043:70: sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i gnas las skyob pa yi //
NK041(di)043:71: sbyin pa rnam gsum rtag tu gtong bar shog /
NK041(di)043:72: mi dge'i las lam mtha' dag spong ba dang //
NK041(di)043:73: rgya chen dge ba'i las la 'jug pa dang //
NK041(di)043:74: de dag gzhan la phan phyir bsgrub pa yi //
NK041(di)043:75: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsrung bar shog /
NK041(di)043:76: gnod byed rnams la snying rje bskyed pa dang //
NK041(di)043:77: chos phyi dka' spyad dang du len pa dang //
NK041(di)043:78: chos nyid zab mo'i don la mi skrag pa'i //
NK041(di)043:79: rlabs chen bzod pa sgom pa'i mthu ldan shog /
NK041(di)043:80: rgya chen dge la spro ba'i go cha dang //
NK041(di)043:81: de bzhin sbyor ba bsam pas 'jug pa dang //
NK041(di)043:82: ma zhum mi 'khrugs chog shes med pa yis //
NK041(di)043:83: nyin mtshan dge ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom par shog /
NK041(di)043:84: mthong chos tshe 'dir bde bar gnas pa dang //
NK041(di)043:85: yon tan khyad 'phags rim gyis bgrod pa dang //
NK041(di)043:86: mngon shes la brtan gzhan don bsgrub pa yis //
NK041(di)043:87: bsam gtan don la mnyam par 'jog par shog /
NK041(di)043:88: kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang //
NK041(di)043:89: don dam spros bral mkha' ltar rtog pa dang //
NK041(di)043:90: khyad par gzhan don bslab tshul mkhas pa yis //
NK041(di)043:91: thos bsam sgom pa'i shes rab ldan par shog /
NK041(di)043:92: bsam pa byang chub sems kyis kun bslangs nas //
NK041(di)043:93: sbyor ba pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pas //
NK041(di)043:94: dus dang gnas skabs kun tu brtson pa yis //
NK041(di)043:95: lam lnga sa bcu rim gyis bgrod par shog /
NK041(di)043:96: de yang dran pa nyer bzhag shes rab dang //
NK041(di)043:97: yang dag spong bzhi'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang //
NK041(di)043:98: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
NK041(di)043:99: dang po tshogs kyi lam la 'jug par shog /
NK041(di)043:100: drod dang rtse mo bzod pa chos mchog tu //
NK041(di)043:101: dad brtson dran pa ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
NK041(di)043:102: dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga'i rang bzhin can //
NK041(di)043:103: theg chen sbyor ba'i lam la gnas par shog /
NK041(di)043:104: dran dang chos rab rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang //
NK041(di)043:105: dga' dang shin tu sbyangs dang ting nge 'dzin //
NK041(di)043:106: btang snyoms byang chub yan lag bdun bsgoms nas //
NK041(di)043:107: mthong lam la gnas rab dag'i sa thob shog /
NK041(di)043:108: lta dang rtogs dang ngag dang las mtha' dang //
NK041(di)043:109: 'tsho dang rtsol dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
NK041(di)043:110: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad bsgoms nas //
NK041(di)043:111: sgom pa'i lam du sa bcu bgrod par shog /
NK041(di)043:112: de yang dri med 'od byed 'od 'phro dang //
NK041(di)043:113: sbyang dka' mngon gyur ring song mi g.yo ba //
NK041(di)043:114: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin thob nas //
NK041(di)043:115: mthar phyin kun tu 'od la gnas par shog /
NK041(di)043:116: de lta lam lnga sa bcu yongs rdzogs nas //
NK041(di)043:117: sku gsum ye shes lnga dang yon tan tshogs //
NK041(di)043:118: phrin las mtha' dag 'bad med lhun grub ste //
NK041(di)043:119: rab 'byams zhing gi 'gro ba 'dren par shog /
NK041(di)043:120: dus gsum rgyal ba'i zhing gi bkod pa dang //
NK041(di)043:121: 'khor dang sku tshe'i tshad dang zhing khams sogs //
NK041(di)043:122: phan bde bstan pa'i sgyu 'phrul ci 'dra ba //
NK041(di)043:123: de 'dra kho nar bdag kyang 'gyur bar shog /
NK041(di)043:124: rang bzhin rnam dag don dam chos kyi dbyings //
NK041(di)043:125: sgrib gnyis dri ma'i tshogs la rnam grol ba //
NK041(di)043:126: dag pa gnyis ldan mngon du 'gyur ba dang //
NK041(di)043:127: rang don mthar phyin chos sku 'thob par shog /
NK041(di)043:128: 'og min chen por mtshan dper 'bar ba'i skus //
NK041(di)043:129: dag pa'i gdul bya sa bcu'i sems dpa' la //
NK041(di)043:130: rgyun mi 'chad par theg mchog zab mo'i chos //
NK041(di)043:131: ston mdzad longs spyod rdzogs sku mngon gyur shog /
NK041(di)043:132: gang gis srid pa ji srid gnas kyi bar //
NK041(di)043:133: gang la gang 'os 'gro la theg pa'i tshul //
NK041(di)043:134: gang 'os ston pa sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku //
NK041(di)043:135: gang de thob nas gzhan don lhun grub shog /
NK041(di)043:136: chos kyi dbyings dang me long lta bu dang //
NK041(di)043:137: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor kun tu rtog /
NK041(di)043:138: 'bad rtsol med par bya ba kun 'grub pa'i //
NK041(di)043:139: ye shes lnga la dbang 'byor thob par shog /
NK041(di)043:140: gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dbang po dang //
NK041(di)043:141: khams dang mos pa sna tshogs kun 'gro'i lam //
NK041(di)043:142: bsam gtan sngon gnas rjes dran lha yi mig /
NK041(di)043:143: zag zad mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan shog /
NK041(di)043:144: rang don chos sku rdzogs par byang chub nas //
NK041(di)043:145: zag pa bag chags bcas pa kun spangs te //
NK041(di)043:146: gzhan gyi don du lam dang gegs ston la //
NK041(di)043:147: mi 'jigs yon tan bzhi dang ldan par shog /
NK041(di)043:148: 'khrul dang ca co mi mnga' spyod pa dang //
NK041(di)043:149: 'dun sogs nyams pa med pa rtogs pa dang //
NK041(di)043:150: ye shes phrin las 'gran zla med pa yis //
NK041(di)043:151: ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams thob par shog /
NK041(di)043:152: blta bas mi ngoms mtshungs pa med pa'i sku //
NK041(di)043:153: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab rgyan cing //
NK041(di)043:154: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rab mdzes pas //
NK041(di)043:155: sna tshogs gdul bya'i re 'dod bskor bar shog /
NK041(di)043:156: tshul khrims phung po de bzhin ting nge 'dzin //
NK041(di)043:157: shes rab dang ni rnam par grol ba dang //
NK041(di)043:158: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yi //
NK041(di)043:159: zag med phung po lnga ni yongs rdzogs shog /
NK041(di)043:160: spyan dang mngon shes so so rig pa dang //
NK041(di)043:161: gzungs dang zad par zil gnon thugs rje can //
NK041(di)043:162: nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dbang bcu sogs //
NK041(di)043:163: yon tan mtha' dag mngon du 'gyur bar shog /
NK041(di)043:164: de ltar rgyal ba'i sku gsum ye shes lnga //
NK041(di)043:165: yon tan phrin las sogs la dbang 'byor nas //
NK041(di)043:166: rab 'byams zhing du dpag yas mdzad pa yis //
NK041(di)043:167: mtha' yas 'gro la phan bde bsgrub par shog /
NK041(di)043:168: mkhyen rab 'jam dpal dbyangs ltar tshad med cing //
NK041(di)043:169: thugs rje spyan ras gzigs dang mtshungs pa dang //
NK041(di)043:170: mthu stobs gsang ba'i bdag po ji bzhin du //
NK041(di)043:171: grangs med bskal par 'gro don byed par shog /
NK041(di)043:172: gang gis bdag ni mthong dang thos pa dang //
NK041(di)043:173: rjes su dran nam reg gam gtam du brjod //
NK041(di)043:174: bdag las legs bshad thos pa de dag kyang //
NK041(di)043:175: ring por mi thogs rgyal ba'i dbang por shog /
NK041(di)043:176: bdag ni grang bas nyen la me chen dang //
NK041(di)043:177: tsha bas gdung la bsil ba'i 'bab chu dang //
NK041(di)043:178: brgal 'dod rnams kyi gru dang zam pa dang //
NK041(di)043:179: mun pa tshud la snang ba dam par shog /
NK041(di)043:180: phongs pa rnams la 'dod dgu'i 'byung gnas dang //
NK041(di)043:181: nad kyis zin la phan byed sman gyi mchog /
NK041(di)043:182: 'chi bas nyen la 'tsho ba'i bdud rtsi dang //
NK041(di)043:183: lam gyis dub pa'i bsti gnas bzang por shog /
NK041(di)043:184: bdag ni gnas med rnams kyi khang bzang dang //
NK041(di)043:185: bkres pas gdung la ro ldan bza' ba dang //
NK041(di)043:186: skom pa rnams la btung ba'i mchog dang ni //
NK041(di)043:187: gang la gang 'os 'dod dgu 'byung bar shog /
NK041(di)043:188: mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum spyod pa kun //
NK041(di)043:189: bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin nor bu dang //
NK041(di)043:190: 'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing lta bur //
NK041(di)043:191: 'gro ba'i don du 'bad med lhun grub shog /
NK041(di)043:192: skyabs gsum bka' sdod bden pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK041(di)043:193: chos dbyings rnam dag bsam mi khyab pa'i mthus //
NK041(di)043:194: bdag gi lhag bsam dag pas gzhan don du //
NK041(di)043:195: smon pa 'di dag yid bzhin 'grub gyur cig /
NK041(di)043:196: ston pa mnyam med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
NK041(di)043:197: skyob pa mtshungs med bstan pa dam pa'i chos //
NK041(di)043:198: 'dren pa tshad med 'phags pa'i dge 'dun te //
NK041(di)043:199: dkon mchog bla med gsum gyis bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)043:200: de ltar rab dang gzhan la phan pa'i blos //
NK041(di)043:201: byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam rlabs po che //
NK041(di)043:202: phan bde'i ljon pa 'di brjod dge ba yis //
NK041(di)043:203: 'gro rnams don gnyis mngon sangs rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)043:204: blo gros kun gsal mdzes pa'i lang tsho mchog /
NK041(di)043:205: dag snang lhur len dag pa'i gsungs zer gyis //
NK041(di)043:206: bdag blo 'dab stong rgyas par rab bskul bas //
NK041(di)043:207: tshul bzhin legs bshad sbrang rtsi 'di 'bul lo //
NK041(di)043:208: byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam phan bde'i ljon pa
NK041(di)043:209: zhes bya ba 'di rje btsun dam pa rat+na'i zhabs
NK041(di)043:210: rdul spyi bor gus pas len pa bka'i 'bangs shes
NK041(di)043:211: rab 'od zer gyis snying po'i bsgrub pa lhur len
